mapper.update:
update USER_PROFILE_VIEW
USERS_ID = #{record.usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOGIN_NAME = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_NAME = #{record.displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIMARY_IP = #{record.primaryIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIMARY_MEMBER_GROUP_ID = #{record.primaryMemberGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DATE_REGISTERED = #{record.dateRegistered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{record.emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN = #{record.lastLogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PERSONAL_TEXT = #{record.personalText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{record.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BIRTH_DATE = #{record.birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_TITLE = #{record.userTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIDE_EMAIL_FLAG = #{record.hideEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_AGE_FLAG = #{record.hideAgeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_GENDER_FLAG = #{record.hideGenderFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_BIRTH_DATE_FLAG = #{record.hideBirthDateFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TIME_OFFSET = #{record.timeOffset,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
TIME_ZONE = #{record.timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKYPE = #{record.skype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AIM = #{record.aim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YIM = #{record.yim,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GTALK = #{record.gtalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STEAM = #{record.steam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NNID = #{record.nnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XBOX_LIVE = #{record.xboxLive,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSN = #{record.psn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIDE_SKYPE_FLAG = #{record.hideSkypeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_AIM_FLAG = #{record.hideAimFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_YIM_FLAG = #{record.hideYimFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_GTALK_FLAG = #{record.hideGtalkFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_STEAM_FLAG = #{record.hideSteamFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_NNID_FLAG = #{record.hideNnidFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_XBOX_LIVE_FLAG = #{record.hideXboxLiveFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
HIDE_PSN_FLAG = #{record.hidePsnFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
AVATAR_ID = #{record.avatarId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AVATAR_FILENAME = #{record.avatarFilename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVATAR_URL = #{record.avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVATAR_GALLERY_ID = #{record.avatarGalleryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AVATAR_TYPE_ID = #{record.avatarTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AVATAR_FILE_PATH = #{record.avatarFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_TITLE = #{record.customTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOCATION = #{record.location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_TITLE = #{record.websiteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_URL = #{record.websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTIFICATION_SETTINGS_ID = #{record.notificationSettingsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AUTO_SUBSCRIBE_FLAG = #{record.autoSubscribeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
SEND_POST_IN_EMAIL_FLAG = #{record.sendPostInEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
INSTANT_FLAG = #{record.instantFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
ONLY_FIRST_FLAG = #{record.onlyFirstFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
REPLIES_FLAG = #{record.repliesFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
MODERATION_FLAG = #{record.moderationFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
ONLY_ME_FLAG = #{record.onlyMeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
KARMA_EMAIL_FLAG = #{record.karmaEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
KARMA_PM_FLAG = #{record.karmaPmFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TAGGED_EMAIL_FLAG = #{record.taggedEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
TAGGED_PM_FLAG = #{record.taggedPmFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
PM_EMAIL_FLAG = #{record.pmEmailFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
FREQUENCY_ID = #{record.frequencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REPLIES_TO_ME_FLAG = #{record.repliesToMeFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
POSTED_IN_FLAG = #{record.postedInFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
